text:
rAjan diqva Aqcara#nti | 
tEBi#rnO dEvaq mahiq Sarma# yacCaq SaM na# Edhi dviqpadEq SaM catu#ShpadE || 
buqddhnAdagraq-ma~ggi#rOBi-rgRuNAqnO vi parva#tasya dRu(gm)hiqtAnyai#rat | 
ruqjadrOdhA(gm)#sikRuqtrimA$NyEShAq(gm)qsOma#syaqtAmadaqindra#ScakAra || 
buqddhnAdagrE#Naq vi mi#mAyaq mAnaiqrvajrE#Naq KAnya#tRuNannaqdInA$M | 
vRuthA# &sRujat paqthiBi# rdIrGayAqthaiH sOma#syaq tA madaq indra#ScakAra || 55
